command.name: spt
command.abstract: shows the current SPT computed for this node

description.p: This command shows the SPT computed by the IGP model for this node. The SPT is shown using the graphviz (http://www.graphviz.org) graph format. It shall then be rendered using the "dot" utility.

see-also.p: See command net domain X computenet_domain_compute to learn how an SPT can be computed for one node.
